spell.name: The Log
entries: You conjure up a 5 foot wide rolling log that crashes through a 30 foot line starting at a point in range. Each grounded creature in that area must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes {@damage 1d10} bludgeoning damage and is knocked {@condition prone} as well as pushed 5 feet in the direction the log is travelling. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't knocked {@condition prone} or pushed. The log then crumbles into nothing.
â€œA spilt bottle of Rage turned an innocent tree trunk into "The Log". Now, it seeks revenge by crushing anything in its path!

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d10} for each slot level above 2nd.
